title: MATERIALISTIK ICON PACK v2.1 APK (Android)
description:
READ FIRST!!
IF WALLPAPER PICKER AND REQUEST FEATURES WENT WRONG PLEASE "CLEAR DATA" TO MAKE SURE THEY WORK PROPERLY

Welcome to MATERIALISTIK Icon Pack. Your Android M 
MATERIALISTIK is well manually drawn base on Google's Material Design Guideline with material palette will change your device to the future of Android M!

NOTE
IF WALLPAPER PICKER AND REQUEST FEATURES WENT WRONG PLEASE "CLEAR DATA" TO MAKE SURE THEY WORK PROPERLY

Features:
1950+ icons inspired by material design
50+ HD 3000x2675 px cloud-based wallpaper for direct access to newest wallpaper
XXXHDPI Icon 192x192 px
Full manually vector graphic processing icons
Icon masking for better unthemed icons
See & Search all icons
Smart Icon Request
Support Muzei
Image picker, attach as an image to email, hangouts, Etc or even use it to create Zooper widget
Dinamic calendar support (including Google and Today Calendar)
Help section, contains FAQs with search function
Report bugs
Show/Hide launcher icon from app drawer
etc
Support 22 major Launchers:
L
Lucid
GO
Next
Apex
Action Pro
Nova
ADW
Holo
Holo HD
TSF Shell
LG Home (read issue for this launcher below)
Themer
CM Theme Engine
Launchy Widget
Trebuchet
Unicon
And may be more that have icon pack support

What's in this version :
Very quick update: fixed force close after updating on ver 1.8. Sory my bad, my bad, my bad. God help me on this version!
Fixed mis-themed for pre-installed app icon of LG device
Required Android O/S : 4.0+
